评论概述: Started falling apart within 2 weeks DO NOT BUY
评论详情: The only reason to buy this belt would be as part of a costume, or a similar reason where you will only wear it a couple of times. If you intend for this belt to be a daily wearable item, do NOT buy this belt. I bought this belt and it started falling apart within 2 weeks of wear. The grommets fell out, the the faux-leather stretched terribly, and by the time I stopped wearing it I could see the internal cardboard wear the grommet used to be. This belt is cheap, but it’s so cheaply made I still feel like I was ripped off. As a replacement, I bought a belt at Hot Topic for only $15 and it is holding together remarkably well. At this point, you can barely tell the Hot Topic belt has been worn, and I’ve owned it for a month. I bring up this replacement belt only to illustrate that you can find decent belts for a similar price point. It is not necessary to accept this trashy belt. This company can manufacture this belt to a higher quality while still making a nice profit. They have simply made this as cheaply and poorly as possible in order to try and make the most profit possible.
